artist: Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina; Painter: After Nicola da Cremona
description: Christ taken down from the cross being wrapped in shroud; group of men and women around him; upper right corner 3 crosses on hill with center one empty
inscription:
signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [ Naicola da Cremona dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Rosaspina inc./ GESU CRISTO DEPOSTO DALLA CROCE]; in image lower right corner in black: [NJHCLO]
title: Gesu Christo Deposto Dalla Croce
